# Funding and Sponsorship Configuration
# This file allows users to sponsor your project through various platforms
# See: https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/displaying-a-sponsor-button-in-your-repository

# GitHub Sponsors
github: [YOUR_USERNAME] # Replace with your GitHub username

# Patreon
patreon: YOUR_PATREON_USERNAME # Replace with your Patreon username

# Open Collective
open_collective: YOUR_COLLECTIVE_NAME # Replace with your Open Collective name

# Ko-fi
ko_fi: YOUR_KOFI_USERNAME # Replace with your Ko-fi username

# Tidelift
tidelift: npm/YOUR_PACKAGE_NAME # Replace with your Tidelift package name

# Community Bridge (LFX Crowdfunding)
community_bridge: YOUR_PROJECT_NAME # Replace with your Community Bridge project name

# Liberapay
liberapay: YOUR_LIBERAPAY_USERNAME # Replace with your Liberapay username

# IssueHunt
issuehunt: YOUR_ISSUEHUNT_USERNAME # Replace with your IssueHunt username

# Buy Me a Coffee
buy_me_a_coffee: YOUR_BUYMEACOFFEE_USERNAME # Replace with your Buy Me a Coffee username

# Custom funding URLs (up to 4)
custom: 
  - "https://paypal.me/YOUR_PAYPAL_USERNAME"
  - "https://www.buymeacoffee.com/YOUR_USERNAME"
  - "https://donorbox.org/YOUR_CAMPAIGN"
  - "https://your-website.com/donate"

# Notes for setup:
# 
# 1. Uncomment and configure only the platforms you actually use
# 2. Remove or comment out platforms you don't use
# 3. Replace ALL placeholder values with your actual usernames/URLs
# 4. Test each URL to ensure they work correctly
# 
# Popular combinations for mobile app developers:
# - GitHub Sponsors + Ko-fi
# - Patreon + Buy Me a Coffee  
# - PayPal + GitHub Sponsors
# 
# Consider adding sponsorship information to your README.md as well:
# 
# ## üíñ Support This Project
# 
# If you find this project helpful, consider supporting its development:
# 
# - ‚≠ê Star this repository
# - üêõ Report bugs and suggest features
# - üí∞ Sponsor via [GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/YOUR_USERNAME)

# 
# Your support helps maintain and improve this project!
# 
# Example minimal configuration for individual developers:
# 
# github: [your-username]
# ko_fi: your-username
# custom: ["https://paypal.me/your-paypal"]
# 
# Example for organization/team projects:
# 
# open_collective: your-project
# custom: ["https://your-company.com/sponsorship"]
